actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Postal Service.

official_title: To designate the building in Orangeburg, South Carolina, which houses the operations of the United States Postal Service as the "J.I. Washington, III, Post Office".

summary.text: Designates a specified building in Orangeburg, South Carolina, as the J.I. Washington, III, Post Office.

titles.title: To designate the building in Orangeburg, South Carolina, which houses the operations of the United States Postal Service as the "J.I. Washington, III, Post Office".
